a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The age dependency ratio is the sum of the young population (under age 15) and elderly population (age 65 and
over) relative to the working-age population (ages 15 to 64). Data are shown as the number of dependents per

path.id: outline__Age dependency ratio (% of working-age population)

text.tspan: Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
